0.1.name: wordpress/wp-global-screen-options
0.1.description: This plugin let's you set global "Screen Options" for all users in the Dashboard and when adding/editing Posts and Pages. Sets screen options for all users, current and new ones. Option to hide "Screen Options" tab on the Posts and Page pages in WP-admin.

0.2.name: wordpress/wp-global-screen-options
0.2.description: This plugin let's you set global "Screen Options" for all users in the Dashboard and when adding/editing Posts and Pages. Sets screen options for all users, current and new ones. Option to hide "Screen Options" tab on the Posts and Page pages in WP-admin.
